name: RainonSkylight
0:
”Alexa open Rain on Skylight”
”Alexa ask Rain on Skylight to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rain on skylight
des:
Rain on Skyligh captures the distinct sound of raindrops hitting a skylight. This skill provides an immersive experience of being indoors during a rainstorm, with the visual and auditory sensation of rain above, enhancing relaxation or focus.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Rain on Skylight
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
